price: "Merjema, budi skrušena i pokorna Gospodaru svome, i sedždu čini i sa onima koji ruku' obavljaju i ti obavljaj!” [1]
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
footnotes: [1] Ovdje su sedžda i ruku' posebno izdvojeni kao sastavni dijelovi namaza.

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
